text: Nine UAMS Physicians Named Healthcare Research All-Stars! 💥🏅 Lowry Barnes, M.D. and team are among the top 1% of hip and knee surgeons nationwide! 💪🏼 UAMS Hip and Knee surgery team is crushing it! 🚀 Also, kudos to the orthopaedic surgery team for being among the top 3% nationwide! 💥👏🏼 UAMS, you're making us proud! 😍
